text: Nagender Bhadana was a member of the Haryana Legislative Assembly from the Indian National Lok Dal representing the Faridabad NIT Vidhan sabha Constituency in Haryana from 2014 to 2019. He joined Bharatiya Janata Party just before 2019 Haryana Legislative Assembly election.INLD releases first list of 64 candidates == References == Category:Living people Category:Members of the Haryana Legislative Assembly Category:Indian National Lok Dal politicians Category:People from Faridabad Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Haryana
title: Nagender Bhadana
